text:
獨創防滑氧氣布：不悶熱，敏感肌自在穿
萬個呼吸微孔胸墊：讓雙胸自帶排氣孔，全天高效清爽
厚/薄立體胸墊：1件附2款胸墊！ 厚墊4公分/ 薄墊1公分
下厚上薄魚骨支撐：圓渾升級，彎腰不捲，鞠躬也貼合
容量加深包覆加倍：A-E 把肉肉收乾淨，副乳不外散
裸感無鋼圈設計：柔軟不壓，百搭隱形No problem
高彈不勒穩固不崩：十足彈性+四排四扣隨心調節
trans:
Innovative Anti-Slip Oxygen Fabric: Breathable, comfortable for sensitive skin
Thousands of Breathable Micro-Hole Breast Pads: Let the chest naturally ventilate, keeping fresh all day
Thick/Thin 3D Breast Pads: 1 set includes 2 pads! Thick pad 4cm / Thin pad 1cm
Thicker Bottom, Thinner Top Fishbone Support: Upgraded round shape, no rolling when bending, fits well when bowing
Deeper and Double Coverage Capacity: A-E cups, smooths out excess fat, no side breast bulge
Bare Feel Wireless Design: Soft, non-compressive, versatile and invisible, no problem
High Elasticity, No Tightness, Secure Fit: Excellent elasticity + four-row, four-hook adjustable for comfort
